dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Cody Media
dmca.body:
October 10, 2006

To whom it may concern, 

I work at Seancody.com. It was brought to our attention that few of your members have downloaded our images and are promoting them on your site. This is completely unacceptable. I am pretty sure that you are not aware of this, however, we need to figure out a way so that you know which ones are our images and that they are taken down IMMEDIATELY. All images under the name Sean Cody should be taken down immediately. I do not want to escalate this situation and to get our attorneys involved. Your cooperation in this matter is greatly appreciated.

We have all rights to ALL Seancody images. No one other than us(Cody Media) is allowed to copy, distribute and profit from these videos.

Not only is it illegal for your firm to post adult content without the 2257 information, you're also directly violating our copyright of Cody Media. When it comes to the pirating of our images, we take these matters seriously. What are your future plans for insuring that our content not only doesn't appear on your website, but stays off?

Here is the permalink-
httri://toninparis.blopspot.com/2006R Oltanner.htrnl 
http:/Jtominparisbloqsoot.com/2006/1 Q/ross.html 
http://tominpariabloasoot com/2006/1 0/bound html 
The same images can be found on Seancody.com. We are the owners of these images that being used on your website.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its and or the law.

I swear, under the penalty of perjury, that the information is the notification is accurate and I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
Yune Nielsen 
[signed]
Manager, Legal Affairs 
Cody Media Inc 
Yune@codvmedia.com 
619.276.800 Ext 101
